name: Be The Dungeon.
description:
Instructions:

You only control the dungeon, as the man only runs from left to right, protect him from bombs and help guide the man to collect stars by placing tiles on the nine grid spaces.

Each tile you will place is on the top left. When one tile is placed you will move on to the next one.

Tiles:

[二] - Spring Tile, the man and bomb can bounce on this

[_] - Floor Tile, the man and bomb can land on this

[ ] - No Tile, the man and bomb can fall through this

[■] - Wall Tile, the man and bomb will die if on the same grid but the man and bomb can land on this if above

Controls:

E - Place tile on Grid 1

R - Place tile on Grid 2

T - Place tile on Grid 3

D - Place tile on Grid 4

F - Place tile on Grid 5

G - Place tile on Grid 6

C - Place tile on Grid 7

V - Place tile on Grid 8

B - Place tile on Grid 9

Space - Start game

Esc - Restart game

Tips:

-Be wary of bombs that can bounce into you or fall on you when building.

-It beneficial to sometimes switch through tiles on an unoccupied grid or different row to avoid triggering the man or bomb to move.

-If any weird bugs happen, Esc to Restart, Swag.

DEV HIGH SCORE: 59

Made in a week for NOKIA 3310 JAM 4.
